content.en: Enhanced BSO Algorithm: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the Brain Storm Optimization (BSO) algorithm, which is a popular method for solving optimization problems. They have investigated various strategies such as incorporating differential evolution, simulated annealing, and global-best versions. These enhancements have shown promising results, outperforming other algorithms and achieving better global search performance. The improved BSO algorithm has the potential to solve a wide range of practical engineering problems.
content.da: Forbedret BSO-algoritme: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre Brain Storm Optimization (BSO) algoritmen, som er en populær metode til at løse optimeringsproblemer. De har undersøgt forskellige strategier, såsom inkorporering af differential evolution, simuleret annealing og global-bedste versioner. Disse forbedringer har vist lovende resultater, overgået andre algoritmer og opnået bedre global søgepræstation. Den forbedrede BSO-algoritme har potentiale til at løse en bred vifte af praktiske ingeniørproblemer.
